otherNightReminder: If the Angler has chosen a player during the day and 3 or more players are dead, they both may die.
name: Angler
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player (different to last day): you and that player can't die tonight. If 3 or more players are dead, both of you might die tonight instead.

firstNightReminder: The City guard chooses two players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
otherNightReminder: The City guard chooses two players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
name: City guard
ability: Each night, choose two players: you learn if any of them is an outsider.

otherNightReminder: The brute choses a player.
name: Brute
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): they don't wake up tonight.

otherNightReminder: Show character token.
name: Conspirator
ability: Each night, learn a character which is not in the game. You might register as a demon.

name: Private eye
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly announce that you've solved the case. The storyteller will ask you 3 questions. If you answer any of them wrong, you are executed immediately.

firstNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a good character, point to two players.
otherNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a good character, point to two players.
name: Houndmaster
ability: Each night, choose a good character: you learn two players, one of which is this character. If you choose a character not in play, you are drunk until dawn.

firstNightReminder: Show townsfolk character and point to its player.
name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a townsfolk player and their character. That player is drunk while you are alive.

firstNightReminder: The Scholar may choose a player.
otherNightReminder: The Scholar may choose a player.
name: Scholar
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: learn their character and gain that character's ability. If you choose an evil player, you are drunk.

otherNightReminder: The Organ donor may die.
name: Organ donor
ability: Each day, you may publicly ask another player any yes or no question. If they don't lie, you die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Falconer died tonight, show a number.
name: Falconer
ability: If you die at night, you learn how many steps from you to the nearest demon

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon may choose a player.
name: Surgeon
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if they are evil and dead, they are resurrected. If they are good and alive, they die.

name: Pastor
ability: If a townsfolk was executed today, no player can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman died tonight, show him a number.
name: Shaman
ability: When you die, you learn how many dead players are evil.

otherNightReminder: The homeless may die.
name: Homeless
ability: Each night*, if you are not drunk, you die. When you become a target of any ability, you are drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: The Tax collector may become a target of an ability. A townsfolk may die.
name: Tax collector
ability: If you did not become a target of any ability today or tonight, a townsfolk might die at night.

otherNightReminder: The Actor may die.
name: Actor
ability: Each day, if you don't roleplay as a single character in the script, you might die at night.

otherNightReminder: The Zombie may be resurrected.
name: Zombie
ability: Each night*, you might be resurrected. You always register as dead.

name: No one
ability: You always register as not in play. You always know you are a No one. If you vote, you die immediately, but the vote counts.

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a player.
name: Judas
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. If you choose a demon, he becomes good. At dusk, if no evil demons are alive and no one was executed today, evil wins.

otherNightReminder: Rasputin may choose a player.
name: Rasputin
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose a player: they are resurrected. If you are dead, you may only choose yourself.

firstNightReminder: Wake both the Rat and evil demons, the Rat choses a player, show two character tokens.
otherNightReminder: Wake both the Rat and evil demons, the Rat choses a player, show two character tokens.
name: The Rat
ability: Each night, choose a player: both you and all evil demons learn two characters, one of which is that player.

otherNightReminder: If The goat was nominated today, a player dies.
name: The Goat
ability: The player who nominated you today dies tonight.

otherNightReminder: Nyrtho may choose a player and an outsider they become.
name: Nyrtho
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they become an outsider which is not in play, but they don't know. You start knowing which outsiders are in play. [-2 outsiders]

otherNightReminder: Ghuul chooses a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You always register as dead. If you are dead at night, you become resurrected. Evil can't lose as long as any other evil player is alive.

otherNightReminder: Camazotti chooses a player.
name: Camazotti
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a dead player is chosen, they become evil.

otherNightReminder: Chernobog chooses a player.
name: Chernobog
ability: A townsfolk player is a good demon, but does not know. When you die, that player learns that he is a demon. Each night*, choose a player: they die. If the good demon lives, you may only choose his alive neighbours.
